definition: great nebula in Andromeda or Andromeda galaxy M31
pinyin: Xian1 nu:3 zuo4 da4 xing1 yun2

sentences.english: Once more, Cinderella's fairy godmother reminded her to be home by midnight.
sentences.chinese: 仙女教母再一次提醒辛德瑞拉要在午夜前到家。

sentences.english: A Nereid, goddess of the sea and the wife of Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 海中仙女，海的女神，波塞顿之妻。

sentences.english: A constellation in the Northern Hemisphere near Andromeda and Auriga.
sentences.chinese: 我们的星系刻正移向与仙女座星系碰撞之途。

sentences.english: Numerous fairy people gallop to disembark.
With a faery, hand in hand.
There were twelve fairies, and they were all sent invitations.
sentences.chinese: 一共有十二位仙女，她们都收到了邀请。

sentences.english: Nereid, goddess of the sea and the wife of Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 海中仙女，海的女神，波塞冬之妻。

sentences.english: The Bastard Fairies could be termed an oxymoron.
sentences.chinese: “私生的仙女”也许应该被定义为一种矛盾。

sentences.english: This land is ruled by the Sugarplum Fairy.
sentences.chinese: 统治这片土地是由萨加普拉姆仙女。

sentences.english: The fairies had turned him into a water baby.
sentences.chinese: 仙女们已将他变成小水娃。

sentences.english: Pisces is a constellation south of Andromeda.
sentences.chinese: 双鱼座位于仙女座的南边。

sentences.english: Status Offline This is how naiad dyads often end.
sentences.chinese: 这是“水中仙女二元体”通常的结局。

sentences.english: In Ruan Gao's" Fairies of the Celestial Realm," there are also evident changes.
sentences.chinese: 而阮高的“天界仙女图”变化很大。

sentences.english: At last she believed that the tulip bed was under the protection of the fairies.
sentences.chinese: 她终于相信，郁金香花圃是受了仙女的保护。

sentences.english: That night, fairies came to her bed and carried her away.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，仙女们来到她床前将她带走了。

definition: lit. not eating the food of common mortals/fig. placing oneself above the common populace
pinyin: bu4 shi2 ren2 jian1 yan1 huo3

definition: lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
